name: Yuan-ti Anathema
senses: Blindsight 30 ft. | Darkvision 60 ft., Passive Perception 17

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting (Anathema Form Only).
special_abilities.desc: The anathema’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
special_abilities.desc: The anathema has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Ophidiophobia Aura.
special_abilities.desc: Any creature of the anathema’s choice, other than a snake or a yuan-ti, that starts its turn within 30 feet of the anathema and can see or hear it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of snakes and yuan-ti. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Shapechanger.
special_abilities.desc: The anathema can use its action to polymorph into a Huge giant constrictor snake, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

special_abilities.name: Six Heads.
special_abilities.desc: The anathema has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

actions.name: Multiattack (Anathema Form Only).
actions.desc: The anathema makes two claw attacks, one constrict attack, and one Flurry of Bites attack.

actions.name: Claw (Anathema Form Only).
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Constrict.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns, and the anathema can’t constrict another target.

actions.name: Flurry of Bites.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 27 (6d6 + 6) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.
